Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the bottom border of a window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each property of the VisualStyleElement.Window.FrameBottom class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for a different state of the bottom border of a window.
